name: Save new leads generated by Happierleads to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new lead is generated by Happierleads, Make will automatically save this lead to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18IZrU8_TiP4V0s2L_ahtDptVVyMweNSzB4Ub02sjgHg/edit?usp=sharing).
